table.name: vtiger_ideas
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_ideas` ( `ideasid` int(19) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `ideas_no` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `subject` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `ideasstatus` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `extent_description` text, PRIMARY KEY (`ideasid`), CONSTRAINT `fk_1_vtiger_ideas` FOREIGN KEY (`ideasid`) REFERENCES `vtiger_crmentity` (`crmid`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_ideascf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_ideascf` ( `ideasid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ideasid`), CONSTRAINT `fk_1_vtiger_ideascf` FOREIGN KEY (`ideasid`) REFERENCES `vtiger_ideas` (`ideasid`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
